version_description:
Update some UI elements.
Add two fingers tap & two fingers pan gestures.
Add Keep Awake feature as well as Auto-Dim on idle.
Add Auto Reconnect feature.
Change cursor & scroll speed range for high precision.
Fix position of some keyboard buttons.

Update some UI elements.
Add two fingers tap & two fingers pan gestures.
Add Keep Awake feature as well as Auto-Dim on idle.
Add Auto Reconnect feature.
Change cursor & scroll speed range for high precision.
Fix position of some keyboard buttons.

Add Simplified Chinese language.
Fix bugs.

Add Simplified Chinese language.
Fix bugs.

Add PowerPoint presentation tool panel.
Task switch buttons on tool bar has been moved to a new task switch panel.
Please upgrade MouseServer to latest version(1.4.0.0) on your PC to enable new feature.

Add PowerPoint presentation tool panel.
Task switch buttons on tool bar has been moved to a new task switch panel.
Please upgrade MouseServer to latest version(1.4.0.0) on your PC to enable new feature.
Fix bugs.
Fix bugs.

Add window control bar,now you can click minimize,maximize/restore,close window button on your iPhone with WiFi Mouse Pro.
Please upgrade Mouse Server on your PC/Mac to version 1.5.0.0

Add window control bar,now you can click minimize,maximize/restore,close window button on your iPhone with WiFi Mouse Pro.
Please upgrade Mouse Server on your PC/Mac to version 1.5.0.0

1, New UI
2, Support screen capture
3, Support control many media player
4, Support show/hide control panel
5, Support 4 themes.

Note: please update mouse server for Mac/PC to latest version.

1, New UI
2, Support screen capture
3, Support control many media player
4, Support show/hide control panel
5, Support 4 themes.

Note: please update mouse server for Mac/PC to latest version.

Add in-app purchase items.
Add restore purchases.
Support two fingers to make scroll

Add in-app purchase items.
Add restore purchases.
Support two fingers to make scroll

1. Add password protection. (When server side set password, App need password to connect to server)
2. Remote app detection. (Main UI show the top running app of the computer, tap the icon of that app to enter controller UI)

Notice: Please update mouse server to latest version.

1. Add password protection. (When server side set password, App need password to connect to server)
2. Remote app detection. (Main UI show the top running app of the computer, tap the icon of that app to enter controller UI)

Notice: Please update mouse server to latest version.

1. Support browse and open computer files.
2. Add shortcut for remote personal downloads, documents, music and desktop files.

1. Support browse and open computer files.
2. Add shortcut for remote personal downloads, documents, music and desktop files.

1. Support YouTube
2. Fix browser zoom in/out
3. Fix bugs.

1. Support YouTube
2. Fix browser zoom in/out
3. Fix bugs.

1. Option for show/hide 4 directory shortcuts.
2. Add scroll bar to make scroll easily.

1. Option for show/hide 4 directory shortcuts.
2. Add scroll bar to make scroll easily.
Simulate keyboard feature support Russian, English, Korea, French keyboard layout.
Simulate keyboard feature support Russian, English, Korea, French keyboard layout.

1. Add sway mode for presentation, sway your phone to make mouse cursor movement.
2. Media controller support Potplayer and Netflix.
3. Fix some bugs.

1. Add sway mode for presentation, sway your phone to make mouse cursor movement.
2. Media controller support Potplayer and Netflix.
3. Fix some bugs.
Cloud ID help you easy to find all your computers via internet after set the same Cloud ID on your phones and computers.
Cloud ID help you easy to find all your computers via internet after set the same Cloud ID on your phones and computers.
Restore last connection when start.
Fix many bugs

Fix many bugs
Add adapting UI for iPhone X
Add adapting UI for iPhone X
Restore last connection when start.
Restore last connection when start.
Fix full screen keyboard issue for iPhoneX.
Fix full screen keyboard issue for iPhoneX.

Add Game controller.
Fix bugs.

Add Game controller.
Fix bugs.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

1. Simulate keyboard add PgUp/PgDn keys
2. Browser feature support copy & paste URL address, which could be opened by computer
3. Fix remote application(for Mac) bug

2. Browser feature support copy & paste URL address, which could be opened by computer
3. Fix remote application(for Mac) bug
Support iOS 7.
